name: Oh no! Carbon Monoxide is leaking at the steering wheel?! - The Game
name_original: Oh no! Carbon Monoxide is leaking at the steering wheel?! - The Game
description:
The city gets invaded by aliens that tear down the place, unfortunately the carbon monoxide tank at the steering wheel got damaged while the bus got hit by an alien laser and the bus driver fainted. The passengers now try to drive to the military base for refuge, but since the driver seat gets flooded by carbon monoxide, they have to hold their breath and take turn in driving.

Passengers: Grandma - Need time to think about her actions
Bodybuilder - Is to buff for proper steering
Drug addict -  Is tripping balls
Child - Would need a booster seat
Sports player - Is to tall of the seat
Person wearing glasses - Glasses got broken
3 Racoons in a Trenchcoat - Not added (totally human)
